definitions.title: vb. quadril. intrans.
definitions.body: grow fresh (Ges:§ 56; si vera l., transp. [[טרפשׁ]] [expanded from [[טָפַשׁ]] be wide, loose, delicate, cf. esp. As. tapâšu, be fat, Zim:BP 99 A Frä:ZA iii. 55], cf. Talm. [[טַרְפְּשָׁא]] fatty membrane, Syr. t.erpo4to0 PS:1527 thin flesh; Ar. t.arfa4a be convalescent; but ´[[ר]]: perh. not orig.);—Pf. pass. [[רֻטֲפַשׁ בְּשָׂרוֹ מִנּׂעַר]] Job 33:25 his flesh hath grown fresher than, etc.; rd. perh. [[טפשׁ]] Altschüller:ZAW vi (1886), 212, [[יטפשׁ]] Bi Bu cf. Du.
